name: Single Stick Shooter
description:
You there! We need you to pilot a spaceship and take down the Space Pirate that's been ruining intergalatic trade!

Use our new, experimental rocket ship! It's easy, all the controls are joined together, so just click and hold to tell it where to go, what to shoot, where to boost, what to explode... ok maybe it wasn't the best idea...

(Developed in 48 hours for the GMTK Gam Jam 2021)
